title: 3rd sem ECE subject?
content:
3rd sem ECE subject and their credit please 
Now I am having too 5.6 CGPA in first 2 sems how to improve it in ECE 3rd and 4th sem 
Please give suggestions üôè

comments.body:

Honestly until and unless u understand things clearly, there is no other way to increase your gap.
